alert.note: Alert for Tolland; Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 12:08AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A cluster of thunderstorms with torrential rainfall will impact portions of northwestern Windham, northern Tolland, southwestern Worcester, southeastern Hampshire, southeastern Franklin and southeastern Hampden Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1207 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of thunderstorms with torrential rainfall over Monson, or 10 miles east of Springfield, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Chicopee, West Springfield, Ludlow, Southbridge, Longmeadow, East Longmeadow, Ellington, Tolland, Belchertown, Wilbraham, Oxford, Charlton, Palmer, Stafford, Spencer, Somers, Dudley, Ware and Sturbridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
